derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French clandestin or Latin clandestinus, from clam 'secretly'

entry.tran: (通常因违法而)偷偷摸摸的，暗地里的，秘密的
entry.def: Something that is clandestine is hidden or kept secret, often because it is illegal.

means.word_mean: 1. conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods;
